metadata.name: DllUnregisterServer Function Call Via Msiexec.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects MsiExec loading a DLL and calling its DllUnregisterServer function

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msiexec.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('\\msiexec.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -z ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /z ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –z ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —z ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―z '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')))

output.summary: Detects MsiExec loading a DLL and calling its DllUnregisterServer function
